00167 class Experiment {
00168 protected:
00169   long thts;                                    
00170   Shape sh;                     
00171   Contrast cntr;           
00172 
00173 public:
00174 
00178   inline Experiment(const Shape & _sh, long _thetas) :
00179     sh(_sh),
00180     thts(_thetas)
00181     {
00182     if ( ! thts )
00183       throw_error("Experiment", "Empty list of input files.");
00184     if ( ! sh(0)*sh(1) )
00185       throw_error("Experiment", "Zero-size image requested.");
00186   };
00187 
00194   virtual void projection(int itheta, Map & proj,
00195                           const std::vector<int> & sliceV = std::vector<int>()) const = 0;
00196 
00197   inline long thetas() const {return thts;}                     
00198   inline long pixels() const {return sh(1);}                    
00199   inline long slices() const {return sh(0);}                    
00200   inline Contrast contrast() const {return cntr;} 
00201 
00202 };
